alert.note: Alert for Keokuk; Louisa; Washington (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS QuadCities (Eastern Iowa and Northwestern Illinois - Quad Cities)
info.headline: Dense Fog Advisory issued December 31 at 10:02AM CST until December 31 at 12:00PM CST by NWS QuadCities
info.description: ...DENSE FOG ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON CST TODAY... * WHAT...Visibility down to a quarter mile in dense fog and patchy freezing drizzle. * WHERE...Portions of northeast Missouri, southeast Iowa and west central Illinois. * WHEN...Until noon CST today. * IMPACTS...Hazardous driving conditions due to low visibility and slick roads due to patchy freezing drizzle. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Dense fog continues to become widespread this morning. The fog will also be accompanied by patchy freezing drizzle, which may lead to slick spots on untreated pavement. Sidewalks, driveways, bridges and overpasses could become icy. The dense fog could linger into the afternoon in some areas.
info.instruction: If driving, slow down, use your headlights, and leave plenty of distance ahead of you.
